long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As the founder of SCL I have been working with websites on and off since the late nineties. After a lengthy stint in the corporate world, running development teams and spearheading SEO and PPC strategies, I took the leap in 2011 to set up my own business. We have been growing steadily by word of mouth and now with clients in 3 continents.

This extension allows you to have a shortcut to our website and also to be alerted whenever we post new content.
